00055   const char *usage =
00056     "usage: write_test [options] <total-bytes>\n\n"
00057     "Description:\n"
00058     "  This program will generate various types of write worload"
00059     "  for testing purposes.";
00060 
00061   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00062     static void init_options() {
00063       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00064         ("max-keys", i64()->default_value(0),
00065             "Maximum number of unique keys to generate")
00066         ("key-size", i32()->default_value(12), "Size of each key")
00067         ("value-size", i32()->default_value(1000), "Size of each value")
00068         ("seed", i32()->default_value(1234),
00069             "Pseudo random number generator seed")
00070         ;
00071       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("total-bytes", i64(), "");
00072       cmdline_positional_desc().add("total-bytes", -1);
00073     }
00074   };
00075 
00076   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DefaultPolicy, CommPolicy> Policies;
00077 }
00078 
00079 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00080   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00081   TablePtr table_ptr;
00082   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00083   KeySpec key;
00084   boost::shared_array<char> value_data;
00085   boost::shared_array<char> key_data;
00086   char *value_ptr;
00087 
00088   init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00089 
00090   uint64_t total = get_i64("total-bytes");
00091   uint64_t max_keys = get_i64("max-keys");
00092   uint32_t value_size = get_i32("value-size");
00093   uint32_t key_size = get_i32("key-size");
00094   uint32_t seed = get_i32("seed");
00095 
00096   size_t R = total / value_size;
00097 
00098   if (max_keys == 0)
00099     max_keys = R;
00100 
00101   uint32_t key_offset;
00102   uint32_t max_key_offset = (max_keys * key_size) - key_size;
00103 
00104   srandom(seed);
00105 
00106   Random::seed(seed);
00107 
00108   key_data.reset( new char [ max_keys * key_size ] );
00109   Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(key_data.get(), max_keys * key_size);
00110 
00111   value_data.reset( new char [ R + value_size ] );
00112   Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(value_data.get(), R + value_size);
00113 
00114   Random::seed(seed);
00115 
00116   try {
00117     hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client();
00118 
00119     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("RandomTest");
00120 
00121     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00122   }
00123   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00124     cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00125     return 1;
00126   }
00127 
00128   key.column_family = "Field";
00129 
00130   char *row_key = new char [ key_size + 1 ];
00131   key.row_len = key_size;
00132   key.row = row_key;
00133   row_key[key.row_len] = '\0';
00134 
00135   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00136 
00137   {
00138     boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00139 
00140     try {
00141 
00142       value_ptr = value_data.get();
00143 
00144       for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00145 
00146         key_offset = random() % (max_key_offset + 1);
00147         memcpy(row_key, key_data.get()+key_offset, key_size);
00148 
00149         mutator_ptr->set(key, value_ptr, value_size);
00150 
00151         value_ptr++;
00152 
00153         progress_meter += 1;
00154 
00155       }
00156 
00157       mutator_ptr->flush();
00158     }
00159     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00160       mutator_ptr->show_failed(e, cerr);
00161       _exit(1);
00162     }
00163   }
00164 
00165   stopwatch.stop();
00166 
00167   double total_written = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00168   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00169   printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00170   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00171          total_written / stopwatch.elapsed());
00172   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n",
00173          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00174 }
